name: AddConnectorToBoard
description:
Adds a connector to a specified Miro board.

Use this tool to add a connector to a specified Miro board. Requires 'boards:write' scope and is subject to Level 2 rate limiting.

parameters.name: board_unique_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the Miro board where the connector will be added.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board for which you want to create the connector.

parameters.name: connector_request_body
parameters.description: JSON object defining the connector's details, including startItem, endItem, shape, captions, and style.

id.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item to which you want to attach the connector. Note that Frames are not supported at the moment.

x.description: X-axis relative coordinate of the location where the connector connects with an item, in percentage, minimum 0%, maximum 100%.

y.description: Y-axis relative coordinate of the location where the connector connects with an item, in percentage, minimum 0%, maximum 100%.

position.description: The relative position of the point on an item where the connector is attached. Position with x=0% and y=0% correspond to the top-left corner of the item, x=100% and y=100% correspond to the right-bottom corner.

snapTo.description: The side of the item connector should be attached to, the connection point will be placed in the middle of that side. Option `auto` allows to pick a connection point automatically. Only either `position` or `snapTo` parameter is allowed to be set, if neither provided `snapTo: auto` will be used by default.

startItem.description: The end point of the connector. endItem.id must be different from startItem.id

id.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item to which you want to attach the connector. Note that Frames are not supported at the moment.

x.description: X-axis relative coordinate of the location where the connector connects with an item, in percentage, minimum 0%, maximum 100%.

y.description: Y-axis relative coordinate of the location where the connector connects with an item, in percentage, minimum 0%, maximum 100%.

position.description: The relative position of the point on an item where the connector is attached. Position with x=0% and y=0% correspond to the top-left corner of the item, x=100% and y=100% correspond to the right-bottom corner.

snapTo.description: The side of the item connector should be attached to, the connection point will be placed in the middle of that side. Option `auto` allows to pick a connection point automatically. Only either `position` or `snapTo` parameter is allowed to be set, if neither provided `snapTo: auto` will be used by default.

endItem.description: The end point of the connector. endItem.id must be different from startItem.id

shape.description: The path type of the connector line, defines curvature. Default: curved.

content.description: The text you want to display on the connector. Supports inline HTML tags.

position.description: The relative position of the text on the connector, in percentage, minimum 0%, maximum 100%. With 50% value, the text will be placed in the middle of the connector line. Default: 50%

textAlignVertical.description: The vertical position of the text on the connector. Default: middle

captions.description: Blocks of text you want to display on the connector.

color.description: Hex value representing the color for the captions on the connector. Default: `#1a1a1a`

endStrokeCap.description: The decoration cap of the connector end, like an arrow or circle. Default: stealth.

fontSize.description: Defines the font size, in dp, for the captions on the connector. Default: 14

startStrokeCap.description: The decoration cap of the connector end, like an arrow or circle. Default: none.

strokeColor.description: Hex value of the color of the connector line. Default: #000000.

strokeStyle.description: The stroke pattern of the connector line. Default: normal.

strokeWidth.description: The thickness of the connector line, in dp. Default: 1.0.

textOrientation.description: The captions orientation relatively to the connector line curvature. Default: aligned.

style.description: Contains information about the style of a connector, such as the color or caption font size

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.
